title: ICE / ACELE CHURCH STUFF
description: this is where "the drug lab plan conclusion", "what did you see in the church" and "what's your plan for the church" branches are located

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""I did and I'm sorry." She doesn't..."
dialogueTree.text: "I did and I'm sorry." She doesn't appear surprised. "For what it's worth... which isn't much."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is why I didn't go into the t..."
links.text: "This is why I didn't go into the tent." The lieutenant looks at the ocean, squinting his eyes. "Typical delinquency."

links.title: Acele: ""You don't get to choose your posse..."
links.text: "You don't get to choose your posse, they choose you. Mine are idiots, but they're mine. I tried to talk Andre out of it, I even tried not to lie to you..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Indeed. She merely tried to omit th..."
links.text: Indeed. She merely tried to omit the truth instead.

links.title: You: ""Instead you opted to omit the trut..."
links.text: "Instead you opted to omit the truth. It's the same thing."

links.title: Acele: ""I know. But I knew you'd see throu..."
links.text: "I know. But I knew you'd see through their plan too. I'm not an idiot. I should have been able to control them. I will in the future. I promise."

links.title: Acele: ""You don't get to choose your posse..."
links.text: "You don't get to choose your posse, they choose you. Mine are idiots, but they're mine. I tried to talk Andre out of it..."

links.title: You: ""Should've tried harder. Misleading..."
links.text: "Should've tried harder. Misleading a cop is no joke."

links.title: Acele: ""I know. I should have been able to..."
links.text: "I know. I should have been able to control them. And I will in the future. I promise."

links.title: Empathy: "She seems incredibly controlled all..."
links.text: She seems incredibly controlled all of a sudden. Her fists are clenched and she looks straight ahead. She's keeping herself together with all her might, rippling on the inside.

links.title: Acele: ""May I ask, what did you tell them?""
links.text: "May I ask, what did you tell them?"

links.title: You: "Try to lie about your actions in fr..."
links.text: Try to lie about your actions in front of the lieutenant.

links.title: Drama: "Your words flow sincere."
links.text: Your words flow sincere.

links.title: You: ""I called it crime prevention. You'..."
links.text: "I called it crime prevention. You'll have to go at it straight -- if you have it in you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As good a call as any..." the lieu..."
links.text: "As good a call as any..." the lieutenant says, still looking at the ocean. "Better not to have made one at all though. You'll lose your mind trying to mediate everything these delinquents come up with."

links.title: Drama: "Thine lies, they sing too transpare..."
links.text: Thine lies, they sing too transparent.

links.title: You: ""I called it crime prevention. You'..."
links.text: "I called it crime prevention. You'll have to go at it straight -- if you have it in you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant eyes you suspiciousl..."
links.text: The lieutenant eyes you suspiciously.

links.title: Acele: ""Thank you," the young woman says b..."
links.text: "Thank you," the young woman says blithely. "I'll get them under wraps, I promise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see there's more to this sto..."
links.text: "I can see there's more to this story, detective," he says quietly. "But you're not the first corrupt cop in the RCM."

links.title: You: ""I took a cut of the action. I'm co..."
links.text: "I took a cut of the action. I'm corrupt to the marrow, you see."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh!" She almost smiles, but then d..."
links.text: "Oh!" She almost smiles, but then decides not to. There's a moment of silence.

links.title: Acele: ""Okey dokey then.""
links.text: "Okey dokey then."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful," the lieutenant says, s..."
links.text: "Wonderful," the lieutenant says, still looking at the ocean. "Revachol really needed another cop-for-hire. Maybe later we can go and get some doughnuts?"

links.title: You: ""You know a good doughnut joint?""
links.text: "You know a good doughnut joint?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. Conduct your side-interview an..."
links.text: "No. Conduct your side-interview and let's move on to the case at hand."

links.title: Acele: ""Soooo...?" The young woman looks a..."
links.text: "Soooo...?" The young woman looks at you, then the lieutenant, then you again. Then at the shore. She seems uncomfortable.

links.title: Empathy: "She doesn't get confused often, but..."
links.text: She doesn't get confused often, but she is definitely confused now.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "It's all a ruse. I'm ac..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "It's all a ruse. I'm actually super deep under cover, blurring the lines between reality and make-believe."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please officer, just finish your s..."
links.text: "Please officer, just finish your side-interview. We need to move on to the case at hand."

links.title: You: ""I needed some reál, Kim. It's a ha..."
links.text: "I needed some reál, Kim. It's a hard knock life."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. Now conduct your side-interv..."
links.text: "Okay. Now conduct your side-interview and let's move on to the case at hand."

links.title: You: ""Once I cracked their play I didn't..."
links.text: "Once I cracked their play I didn't really care. I'm not an arbiter. You're someone else's problem."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good call, detective," he says, st..."
links.text: "Good call, detective," he says, still looking at the ocean. "You can lose your mind trying to mediate everything these delinquents come up with. Fate will take care of it for us."

links.title: Acele: ""We won't be anyone's problem. I'll..."
links.text: "We won't be anyone's problem. I'll get them under wraps, I promise."

links.title: You: ""Do what you will with your dance c..."
links.text: "Do what you will with your dance club plans... just no drug labs, please."

links.title: Acele: ""Thank you." The young woman nods...."
links.text: "Thank you." The young woman nods. "I'll get them under wraps, I promise."

links.title: You: ""That I'm going to decide after I'v..."
links.text: "That I'm going to decide after I've looked into the church situation."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, right. That's wise." She nods...."
links.text: "Oh, right. That's wise." She nods. "Take your time."

links.title: You: ""I don't care, I'm *loco*. I just w..."
links.text: "I don't care, I'm *loco*. I just wanted you to know that I know about the plan."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, but I still regret it. I sho..."
links.text: "Okay, but I still regret it. I should have been able to control them. And I will in the future. I promise."

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Oh, that... you're not gonna belie..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, that... you're not gonna believe me. There's no point in me telling you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's less prone to blurting out 'c..."
links.text: She's less prone to blurting out 'crab-man!' than the others.

links.title: You: ""We'll see. Go ahead and tell me.""
links.text: "We'll see. Go ahead and tell me."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay," she nods. "I went in and sa..."
links.text: "Okay," she nods. "I went in and saw a woman next to one of those machines there. Noid calls it a *mainframe*..."

links.title: Acele: ""She was dressed like someone who's..."
links.text: "She was dressed like someone who's being raised by their grandmother, you know. Strange old clothes. Had this absent expression, didn't say anything, just stood still."

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Acele: ""And then, you know, right behind h..."
links.text: "And then, you know, right behind her a man *crawled down the wall*. Upside down, like a crab. Down the church wall. I think the woman didn't even know he was there, he was completely silent..."

links.title: Acele: ""He stopped right before he got to..."
links.text: "He stopped right before he got to the floor, then just hung there like that, looking at me. Right at me. I fucking turned around and walked out. End of story."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like a *crab*, you say?" The lieut..."
links.text: "Like a *crab*, you say?" The lieutenant nods. His face is stone.

links.title: You: ""What did this 'crab-man' look like?""
links.text: "What did this 'crab-man' look like?"

links.title: Acele: ""It was too dark." She shakes her h..."
links.text: "It was too dark." She shakes her head. "I couldn't tell exactly."

links.title: Drama: "C'mon. She obviously could. She alr..."
links.text: C'mon. She obviously could. She already went into detail.

links.title: You: ""C'mon, quit stalling on me. What d..."
links.text: "C'mon, quit stalling on me. What did he look like?"

links.title: Acele: ""He looked like a banger, okay? He..."
links.text: "He looked like a banger, okay? He was all muscular and stuff. Had a mesh tanktop. I know it sounds ridiculous, but that only made it scarier, in a way..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A crab *and* a banger?" The lieute..."
links.text: "A crab *and* a banger?" The lieutenant raises an eyebrow.

links.title: Acele: ""Yes, a 'banger', as in a Mesque ga..."
links.text: "Yes, a 'banger', as in a Mesque gang-member. I know what it sounds like, but that's what I saw."

links.title: You: ""A crab *and* a banger?""
links.text: "A crab *and* a banger?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yes, a 'banger', as in a Mesque ga..."
links.text: "Yes, a 'banger', as in a Mesque gang-member. I know what it sounds like, but that's what I saw."

links.title: You: ""You were right. I don't believe yo..."
links.text: "You were right. I don't believe you."

links.title: Acele: ""I don't blame you. I mean, I would..."
links.text: "I don't blame you. I mean, I wouldn't believe me either. I'm surprised Noid did. Andre I expected, but Noid..." She shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""You were wrong. I do believe you.""
links.text: "You were wrong. I do believe you."

links.title: Acele: ""*Why?*" She raises a brow."
links.text: "*Why?*" She raises a brow.

links.title: You: ""Seems too ludicrous for a lie.""
links.text: "Seems too ludicrous for a lie."

links.title: Acele: ""I guess so." She hesitates. "Anywa..."
links.text: "I guess so." She hesitates. "Anyway -- what else?"

links.title: You: ""What would you stand to gain?""
links.text: "What would you stand to gain?"

links.title: Acele: ""Nothing," she says. "Anyway -- wha..."
links.text: "Nothing," she says. "Anyway -- what else?"

links.title: You: ""Strange things happen.""
links.text: "Strange things happen."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay then," she nods. "They certai..."
links.text: "Okay then," she nods. "They certainly do around me."

links.title: Drama: "C'mon. She obviously could. She alr..."
links.text: C'mon. She obviously could. She already went into detail.

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "I saw him. I saw the crab-m..."
links.text: (Nod.) "I saw him. I saw the crab-man."

links.title: Acele: ""You *saw* him?!" She leans closer...."
links.text: "You *saw* him?!" She leans closer. "Does it mean that you went *in* there? Did you see the other spooker, the one in grandma's clothes?"

links.title: You: ""No, just the crab-man.""
links.text: "No, just the crab-man."

links.title: Acele: ""Hmm..." She sits back on the blank..."
links.text: "Hmm..." She sits back on the blanket, ears red from cold. "That's odd. You should search her machine, maybe it says where she went?"

links.title: You: ""I did see them both, yes.""
links.text: "I did see them both, yes."

links.title: Acele: ""Good, so you believe me." She look..."
links.text: "Good, so you believe me." She looks at the tent. "You should go tell this to Andre, he'll know what to do next."

links.title: You: ""I prefer not to share this informa..."
links.text: "I prefer not to share this information with you."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh. Okay." She sits back on the bl..."
links.text: "Oh. Okay." She sits back on the blanket, ears red from cold. "What about Andre? You should go talk to Andre if you don't want to talk to me."

links.title: You: ""That's not especially frightening.""
links.text: "That's not especially frightening."

links.title: You: ""You're right. Let me ask you about..."
links.text: "You're right. Let me ask you about something else."

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""It's supposed to become, like, a c..."
dialogueTree.text: "It's supposed to become, like, a club. For *anodic dance music*. Like that new style of synthesizer stuff they play at The Paliseum."

links.title: Acele: ""Except that... yeah." She looks at..."
links.text: "Except that... yeah." She looks at the old wooden church up on the poles. As a mean wind comes bellowing in, the six-story structure lets out a doleful shriek.

links.title: Shivers: "The floorboards are twisting and th..."
links.text: The floorboards are twisting and the shooting beams are slowly cracking like bones. Far east of the golden Delta, beyond the industrial port, there is a black patch of unlit coast with the smallest creatures on the ice...

links.title: Shivers: "There will never be a club for anod..."
links.text: There will never be a club for anodic music here.

links.title: Shivers: "Not in a million years."
links.text: Not in a million years.

links.title: You: ""What is *anodic dance music*?"
links.text: "What is *anodic dance music*?

links.title: Acele: ""You know, anodic, cathodic -- musi..."
links.text: "You know, anodic, cathodic -- music that's made with electronic instruments."

links.title: You: ""Electronic instruments -- like wha..."
links.text: "Electronic instruments -- like what?"

links.title: Acele: ""Synthesizers and tape consoles, mi..."
links.text: "Synthesizers and tape consoles, microcomputers too. Anything that uses electricity, but isn't guitars... also found sounds. Stuff like that."

links.title: You: ""Aha! The gardener was wrong -- I'm..."
links.text: "Aha! The gardener was wrong -- I'm not just some disco holdover, I'm going to experience the future."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, of course." She seems unsure..."
links.text: "Yeah, of course." She seems unsure of it, somehow.

links.title: You: "(Forgo celebrating your triumph.) "..."
links.text: (Forgo celebrating your triumph.) "Now about the church..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You see clear, beautiful, violent f..."
links.text: You see clear, beautiful, violent flashes of light. Light cutting through a smoke-filled darkness. That is what the future will look like -- if it ever comes.

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is an evolutionary step up fro..."
links.text: This is an evolutionary step up from amplified instruments, which in turn are a step up from acoustic instruments. What comes after it, you wonder: a black-tinted nothingness, or something finer?

links.title: You: ""Got it. Now about the church...""
links.text: "Got it. Now about the church..."

links.title: Acele: ""What do you need to know?""
links.text: "What do you need to know?"

links.title: You: ""So you want to turn the church int..."
links.text: "So you want to turn the church into a club?"

links.title: Acele: ""I know." She nods towards the slop..."
links.text: "I know." She nods towards the sloping mass of wood on the coast, then shivers. "It's not my idea. Andre and the boys found the place. It was supposed to be deserted, but now they can't even take it..."

links.title: Acele: ""Hey, remember how earlier I said I..."
links.text: "Hey, remember how earlier I said I didn't *need* your help?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. Why do you ask?""
links.text: "Yes. Why do you ask?"

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, well..." She hesitates. "May..."
links.text: "Okay, well..." She hesitates. "Maybe you could *talk* to Andre and the guys? Because there are some strange things going on in that church... if you're police you should look into it, right?"

links.title: You: ""I already spoke with them and agre..."
links.text: "I already spoke with them and agreed to help."

links.title: Acele: ""Wow! Thank you, that's... really c..."
links.text: "Wow! Thank you, that's... really cool of you." She clears her throat. "Anything else you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""I'll talk to them.""
links.text: "I'll talk to them."

links.title: Acele: ""They're inside that thing there."..."
links.text: "They're inside that thing there." She points to the tent. "Would be cool if you did... Was there something else?"

links.title: You: ""We'll see. I prefer to remain non-..."
links.text: "We'll see. I prefer to remain non-committal."

links.title: You: ""I've got enough on my plate as it..."
links.text: "I've got enough on my plate as it is."

links.title: Acele: ""Doesn't hurt to ask, I guess..." S..."
links.text: "Doesn't hurt to ask, I guess..." She shrugs.

links.title: Acele: ""Hey..." Her black eyes widen. "You..."
links.text: "Hey..." Her black eyes widen. "You're a cop..."

links.title: You: ""No. I'm *the police*.""
links.text: "No. I'm *the police*."

links.title: You: ""I don't know where you got that id..."
links.text: "I don't know where you got that idea."

links.title: Acele: ""C'mon, man. Don't mess around..."..."
links.text: "C'mon, man. Don't mess around..." She hesitates.

links.title: Volition: "But not too long. This is important..."
links.text: But not too long. This is important to her. She has the courage to ask.

links.title: Acele: ""Maybe you could *talk* to Andre an..."
links.text: "Maybe you could *talk* to Andre and the guys? Because there are some strange things going on in that church... if you're police you should look into it, right?"

links.title: Acele: ""Hey... don't get me wrong. But you..."
links.text: "Hey... don't get me wrong. But you're a *cop*, right..."

links.title: You: ""Did you put the padlock on the chu..."
links.text: "Did you put the padlock on the church door?"

links.title: Acele: ""It's Noid's padlock, for keeping c..."
links.text: "It's Noid's padlock, for keeping creeps and weirdos out. You should probably talk to him about it."

links.title: Acele: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: You: ""No?""
links.text: "No?"

links.title: Acele: ""Not really, no.""
links.text: "Not really, no."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's trying to get out of a direct..."
links.text: She's trying to get out of a direct lie with semantic tricks. *She personally* didn't put the padlock on the door.

links.title: You: ""Okay, if *you personally* didn't,..."
links.text: "Okay, if *you personally* didn't, then who did?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, you know, that's what I mean..."
links.text: "Yeah, you know, that's what I meant -- Noid did. Noid put the padlock on the door."

links.title: You: ""Wait, is this *Noid* a friend of y..."
links.text: "Wait, is this *Noid* a friend of yours?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, I guess you could say that.""
links.text: "Yeah, I guess you could say that."

links.title: You: ""Why did this Noid-person put a pad..."
links.text: "Why did this Noid-person put a padlock on the church door?"

links.title: Acele: ""To keep more weirdos from getting..."
links.text: "To keep more weirdos from getting in. Fucking Martinaise... I'm sorry." She rattles her teeth. "It's got the worst weirdos. If you get around to it, ask Andre about them, he'll tell you."

links.title: Half Light: "Should you? *Weirdos* sounds bad so..."
links.text: Should you? *Weirdos* sounds bad somehow.

links.title: You: "(Show her the sticker in your ledge..."
links.text: (Show her the sticker in your ledger.) "So, this isn't yours?"

links.title: You: "(Show her the sticker on your ledge..."
links.text: (Show her the sticker on your ledger.) "So, this isn't yours?"

links.title: You: ""Okay then. About that church...""
links.text: "Okay then. About that church..."

links.title: You: ""Enough about the church then. I ha..."
links.text: "Enough about the church then. I had a another question." (Conclude.)
